name: Space Jammed
description:
Space Jammed is about a spaceship that avoids and destroys asteroids, trying to last as long as possible.

If it gets hit, the module that has been hit gets destroyed, making the game harder while a warning window blocks a part of your screen.

To repair the broken part, the player has to complete a QTE while still maneuvering in the asteroid field.

Playing Space Jammed requires to use a controller

 This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2020 and made by : 

Bastien RAPPENECKER

Liéna EULOGE

Aubin VAN OLDEN BARNEVELD

Pierre PETILLAT

Alexis GABORIT
